tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Consulted the doctor for gastritis. Doctor was in a complete hurry. He didn't care to look at the health reports I had given him. Didn't give even few seconds of time to explain my GI related problems that I was facing. He just jumped at conclusion that it was stomach pain and it should probably be hernia and that I need to be on life long medication. I stopped him to say that it wasn't hernia and I had a test done ** ******* ********* ** ***** ** ****** ** ** *** said that test has to be done only where he recommends to be taken. No value for the time and money spent on consultation. Wouldn't recommend to anyone.
reply_text: Worst patient I have seen, has fixed ideas and has no patience to listen! Wants treatment for whatever he thinks is his diagnosis!
